Put mouse over identifiers to see inferred types 
 1: GHC.Types.Module{-# OPTIONS_GHC -fplugin=LiquidHaskellBoot #-}
 2: {-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wno-unused-imports #-}
 3: module Data.Tuple_LHAssumptions where
 4: 
 5: import Data.Tuple
 6: 
 7: {-@
 8: assume Data.Tuple.fst :: {f:(x:(a,b) -> {v:a | v = (fst x)}) | f == fst }
 9: assume Data.Tuple.snd :: {f:(x:(a,b) -> {v:b | v = (snd x)}) | f == snd }
10: 
11: measure fst :: (a, b) -> a
12:   fst (a, b) = a
13: 
14: measure snd :: (a, b) -> b
15:   snd (a, b) = b
16: 
17: qualif Fst(__v:a, __y:b): (__v = (fst __y))
18: qualif Snd(__v:a, __y:b): (__v = (snd __y))
19: @-}
